caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. DEMETRIUS GRANT, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Western District.

opinion.posture: No. 506 WAL 2001, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby DENIED.
